body:
MAD-X (Methodical Accelerator Design) is an application for designing particle accelerators; see https://github.com/MethodicalAcceleratorDesign/MAD-X

Variants supported:
- `x11`: build with x11 support.

Configuration options that are not supported as a variant for this package and left as their default.
- `MADX_STATIC`: always off; build fails when chrpath is called on the static executables (not sure where the issue lies); unlikely use case,
- `MADX_DEBUG`: always off,
- `USE_GC`: use garbage collection; always on,
- `MADX_NTPSA`: build with ntpsa support (one of the included algorithms); always on,
- `MADX_FORCE_32`: force 32-bit build; always off,
- `MADX_LAPACK`: use system blas/lapack; always on,
- `MADX_ONLINE`: build with SDDS online support; always off.
title: madx: new package, versions 5.07.00, 5.08.00, 5.08.01
